AFTER 3:00PM AND NOT ON SUNDAY (THE LORD'S DAY.)*~*

messages.msgSnippet: Me to, Elissa.  I m also getting stuf from yesterday and some stuff from today all mixed up.  It makes it very hard to follow conversations. Katy
messages.messageBody:
Me to, Elissa. I'm also getting stuf from yesterday and some stuff from today all mixed up. It makes it very hard to follow conversations.
Katy
